sourcesContent:
export const quiz4 =  {
  "quizTitle": "Section 4: Exotics",
  "quizSynopsis": "This is the real hard part - let's see how well you know your exotics.",

  "appLocale": {
    "landingHeaderText": "<questionLength> Exotic Perks",
    "question": "Perk",
    "startQuizBtn": "Try me.",
    "resultFilterAll": "All",
    "resultFilterCorrect": "Correct",
    "resultFilterIncorrect": "Incorrect",
    "nextQuestionBtn": "Next",
    "resultPageHeaderText": "You have completed this section. You got <correctIndexLength> out of <questionLength> questions.",
    "singleSelectionTagText": "Section 4",
    "pickNumberOfSelection": "Choose <numberOfSelection>",
  },

  "questions": [
    {
      "question": "Which exotic weapon does this perk belong to?",

      "answers": [

      "explanation": "Rat King - Vermin: Reloading immediately after a kill grants a brief period of invisibility.",

      "segment2": "5 Points",

    },

      "explanation": "Rat King - Vermin: Reloading immediately after a kill grants a brief period of invisibility.",

        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/2/27/IMG_8810.JPG",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/d/d9/Le_monarque_icon1.jpg"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "4",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "One of my personal favourites - Le Baguette. Sorry, I meant Monarque.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "A Black Armory exotic, and one of my personal favourites - Le Monarque.",
      "explanation": "Le Monarque - Poison Arrows: Arrows fired quickly after a full draw become poison arrows. Precision hits with poison arrows spread poison to nearby enemies.",
      "segment": "Easy",
      "segment2": "5 Points",
      "point": "5",
    },
    {

      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Coldheart used to be the go-to for boss damage in Year 1. How times have changed.",
      "explanation": "Coldheart - Cold Fusion: This weapon shoots a steady cold fusion-powered laser.",
      "segment": "Medium",
      "segment2": "10 Points",
      "point": "10",
    },
    {

      "questionType": "photo",

        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/3/3e/Fighting_lion_icon1.png",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/5/5e/The_fourth_horseman_icon1.jpg",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/e/e5/Leviathan%27s_breath_icon1.jpg"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "4",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "I've heard rumors that this thing can out DPS Xenophage, somehow. I'm yet to test that myself.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "This one's relatively new - the only heavy bow in the game. Apparently, it ain't bad!",
      "explanation": "Leviathan's Breath - Big-Game Hunter: Fires a massive heavy bolt that staggers unshielded enemy combatants. Strong against Unstoppable Champions.",
      "segment": "Medium",
      "segment2": "10 Points",
      "point": "10",
    },
    {

      "questionType": "photo",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/a/a0/Business_time_icon1.png",
      "answers": [
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/2/22/Sweet_business_icon2.png",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/d/d1/Anarchy_icon1.jpg",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/9/9c/Sunshot_icon2.png",
        "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/e/e5/Heir_apparent_icon1.jpg"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "1",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRT.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRT.",
      "explanation": "Sweet Business - Business Time: Sustained fire boosts this weapon's range and rate of fire.",
      "segment": "Medium",
